author: Kaiban Board Contributors

kaiban.claude.additionalFlags.description: Additional flags to pass to Claude CLI (e.g., --dangerously-skip-permissions)

kaiban.claude.executionTimeout.description: Maximum time in minutes to wait for task execution to complete before cleaning up tracking resources.

kaiban.claude.promptTemplate.default: Read the task file at {taskFile} and implement it. The task contains a link to the PRD with full requirements. Update the task status to Done when complete.
kaiban.claude.promptTemplate.description: Prompt template for Claude execution. Use {taskFile} for the task file path.

kaiban.claude.useRalphLoop.description: Use /ralph-loop plugin if available. When false, runs Claude directly with the task.

kaiban.cli.defaultProvider.description: Default CLI provider for task execution. Use 'auto' to automatically select the first available CLI.
enumDescriptions: Automatically select the first available CLI (Claude > Codex > Cursor)

kaiban.codex.additionalFlags.description: Additional flags to pass to Codex CLI

kaiban.codex.promptTemplate.default: Read the task file at {taskFile} and implement it. The task contains a link to the PRD with full requirements. Update the task status to Done when complete.
kaiban.codex.promptTemplate.description: Prompt template for Codex execution. Use {taskFile} for the task file path.

kaiban.columns.agents.description: Default agent assignment per column. Valid agent values: 'Claude Code', 'Codex', 'None'.

kaiban.columns.enabled.description: List of column names to display on the Kanban board. Valid values: 'Backlog', 'Planning', 'In Progress', 'AI Review', 'Human Review', 'Done', 'Archived', 'Blocked'.

kaiban.cursor.additionalFlags.description: Additional flags to pass to Cursor CLI

kaiban.cursor.promptTemplate.default: Read the task file at {taskFile} and implement it. The task contains a link to the PRD with full requirements. Update the task status to Done when complete.
kaiban.cursor.promptTemplate.description: Prompt template for Cursor execution. Use {taskFile} for the task file path.

kaiban.github.autoCloseIssue.description: Automatically close linked GitHub issue when task is marked Done.

kaiban.merge.preferredProvider.description: Preferred AI provider for merge conflict resolution.

kaiban.merge.useAIAssist.description: Use AI assistance for merge conflict resolution.

kaiban.pipeline.autoReviewOnAIReview.description: Auto-trigger Codex review when task moves to AI Review status.

kaiban.pipeline.enabled.description: Enable automatic pipeline orchestration (Claude → Codex Review → Claude with Ralph Loop).

kaiban.pipeline.maxRetryIterations.description: Maximum times to retry after failed review before moving to Human Review.

kaiban.pipeline.onReviewFail.description: Action when review fails: auto-retry with Claude or stop at Human Review.

kaiban.prd.basePath.description: Base path for PRD (Product Requirements Document) files. PRD paths in task files will be resolved relative to this path.

kaiban.ralph.command.description: Ralph command to execute. Can be a Claude Code plugin command (e.g., /ralph-loop:ralph-loop) or a bash script path (e.g., bash /path/to/ralph-loop.sh)

kaiban.ralph.completionPromise.description: Completion promise template for ralph-loop. If empty, will use task description as completion signal.

kaiban.review.preferCodex.description: Prefer Codex CLI for code reviews (falls back to Claude if unavailable).

kaiban.skills.useAgentFolderInit.description: Use agent-folder-init Claude plugin to scaffold .agent/ folder (requires plugin installed via Claude CLI)

kaiban.skills.useSessionDocumenter.description: Prompt to document session after task completion using session-documenter Claude plugin

kaiban.skills.useTaskPrdCreator.description: Use task-prd-creator Claude plugin when creating tasks (requires plugin installed via Claude CLI)

kaiban.task.basePath.description: Base path for task files. Tasks will be created in and scanned from this directory.

kaiban.worktree.basePath.description: Base path for worktree directories (relative to workspace root).

kaiban.worktree.defaultBaseBranch.description: Default base branch for new worktrees.

kaiban.worktree.enabled.description: Enable git worktree isolation for tasks. Each task runs in its own branch/worktree.

description: Kanban board for Claude CLI task management. Execute markdown tasks via Claude Code directly from your board.
name: kaibanboardcom

scripts.package: bun run compile && mkdir -p build && vsce package --no-dependencies --out build/
